item.title: Medieval Life book series
item.description: Medieval Life book series This is my notes on Medieval Life book series by Frances and Joseph Gies List the sorting is according to this Amazon list Marriage and the Family in the Middle Ages - still need to get Life in a Medieval City - ok The Knight in History - ok Life in a Medieval Castle - ok Life in a Medieval Village - ok Cathedral, Forge and Waterwheel: Technology and Invention in the Middle Ages - ok A Medieval Family: The Pastons of Fifteenth-Century England - ok Women in the Middle Ages: The Lives of Real Women in a Vibrant Age of Transition - ok
